thread.title: Charlotte woman terrified by duck she bought for dinner | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Charlotte woman terrified by duck she bought for dinner | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Charlotte woman terrified by duck she bought for dinner | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad He's quacking up! Shopper is horrified after buying a frozen duck for dinner and finding its head still attached and smiling at her Tiarra Duncan, of Charlotte, North Carolina, assumed the duck would come without the legs and feet when she was preparing to make dinner on Sunday She shared her excitement on Snapchat and took a photo of the packaged meat But her excitement soon turned to terror once she removed the packaging and found the duck staring back at her with its eyes half open She shared photo of the duck's head and wrote: 'Dawgggg I didn't know it was a whole f***ing duck na I just now stopped screaming' People amused by the dead duck's facial expression turned it into a meme Vegans and vegetarians also jumped in to criticize her post Published: 19:01 GMT, 15 February 2017 | Updated: 19:44 GMT, 15 February 2017 191 shares
